item.title: I how to change drop rates on [pi]
item.dc:creator: @beaten beaten
item.description:
@beaten wrote:

darrenshan:

what’s not working? try doing a bone id:0 and it will make it so it drops bones 100% to check if it works.

ive tryed many thing noone of the drops on the list or droping, say its torm demons they only drop ahses and charms. whenthey r sopposed to drop many different thing i killed at least 200 and never got a good drop

item.title: I how to change drop rates on [pi]
item.dc:creator: @beaten beaten
item.description:
@beaten wrote:

[quote=“darrenshan, post:2, topic:412467”]Basically the name should be on the first line
#Man
1:10 995:5000
14484:1
#Man is the name of the npc (name doesn’t have to be accurate).
1:10 --------- 1 is the npc ID, 10 is drop rate of a rare.
995:5000------- Anything on the 2nd line is common so 995 is money and 5000 is the number.
14484:1 ----- 14484 Is d claws I believe and the the drop of getting it is 10 and the 1 in 14484:1 stands for how many.[/quote]
i tryed it and it aint working :
if someone helps me ill… just pm me if u wanna help me

Read full topic
item.source: I how to change drop rates on [pi]

995:5000------- Anything on the 2nd line is common so 995 is money and 5000 is the number.
14484:1 ----- 14484 Is d claws I believe and the the drop of getting it is 10 and the 1 in 14484:1 stands for how many.
